name: Wildstrive
description:
Wildstrive is a beautiful stylized game that will take you to a mysterious desert island where you will have to fight for survival in the wild.

Find a suitable place to build your camp, get food and water. Skillfully use all available resources to create tools, weapons and a farm. Be prepared for the fact that every action you take can have consequences and affect your chances of survival. On the island, skills and logical thinking are required to survive. Get ready to face many dangers and the amazing world of this place.



  • Make the most of everything you can find to survive.
  • Explore wild lands where no man has gone before.
  • Get food and water to stay alive and not die of hunger or thirst.
  • Study, collect and process various plants and mushrooms.





  • Build your own home, furnish it with furniture and household items as you like.
  • Make various items and things from the collected resources.
  • Create steelarms and firearms, tools and equipment.





  • Hunt wild animals and fish for extra food and resources.
  • Defend yourself or run away from predatory animals and creatures.
  • Cook meat from the hunted crocodile at the stake and stock it up for the future.





  • Use the extracted resources to create various items.
  • Chop trees for firewood and construction.
  • Cultivate the land and mine stones, precious minerals and ores.





  • Dynamic change of day and night.
  • Consider weather conditions such as rain, thunderstorms, fog, dust storms.





  • Create your own farm.
  • Explore the wild to find animals to tame.
  • Raise livestock, chickens and pigs.
  • Build your apiary and breed bees for honey in it.
  • Grow vegetables and berries, and enjoy the fruits of your labor.
